attributes.additional_details:
During the Everton FC v Manchester City FC football match on 3rd May 2014, it was obvious that the majority of Everton FC supporters wanted their team to lose. This goes against all sporting etiquette.

I would like the government to consider banning Everton FC supporters from all of their team's match for the 2014/15 season.

rejection.details: One for the Premier League to decide upon.
